title: venus1100
author: venus1100
content: The Bikerush team will host a Trading Competition exclusively on MEXC Global to commemorate the launch of BRT on MEXC and to thank the BRT community for their support. There will be a total of 90,000 BRT up for grabs!Event Dates: 2022-05-24 11:00 a.m. to 2022-05-28 16:00 p.m. (UTC)Be one of the top 20 traders to win 55,000 BRT!Rules:Users who trade BRT with a minimum trading volume of 8,000 USDT worth of BRT during the event period have a chance to win 55,000 BRT rewards.The top 20 traders will be ranked based on their total trading volume, and the following rewards will be distributed:Rank                                  Prize (BRT)                                      Min. Trading Volume (USDT)   1st                                       12,000                                                   20,000   2nd                                      10,000                                                   20,000   3rd                                       8,000                                                    20,0004th - 10th                    Share 14,000 in proportion                                  10,00011th - 20th                  Share 11,000 in proportion                                   8,000Participation Prize - 35,000 BRT in tradeRules:All BRT traders with a minimum trading volume of 500 USDT are eligible to share a prize pool of 35,000 BRT (Excluding the top 20 traders).Each user's prize is proportional to his or her trading volume during the event.Note:-After the event, the winner list and prizes will be announced and distributed within 14 working days.-Buys + Sells = Valid Trading Volume. Transfers between accounts will be prohibited.-To be eligible to claim the rewards, participants in this event must complete the required KYC verification before the end of the event.Users who are among the top 20 traders in the BRT Trading Contest are not eligible for the Participation Prize.Wash trading and any cheating conduct are prohibited. Otherwise, MEXC has the right to deprive the prize, or even freeze the account.This activity was initiated by the Bikerush project party, and the rewards are provided by them. All participating users are deemed to participate voluntarily. The activity does not constitute any investment advice.MEXC reserves the final right to interpret the event.Risk RemindersUsers are strongly advised to do their own research before participating. Nothing herein shall be construed to be financial advice or recommendation to participate in the associated network. The price of the project token may fluctuate greatly due to market conditions and other factors. Withdrawal for the project token may be suspended (fully/partially) due to the token mechanism.
